mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id AS cartId, c.member_id AS memberId, c.product_id AS productId, c.quantity AS quantity, p.name AS productName, p.thumbnail_url AS imageUrl, p.price AS price FROM cart c JOIN product p ON p.product_id = c.product_id WHERE c.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY c.cart_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (member_id, product_id, quantity) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{productId}, #{quantity})
